article_title: How branding is critical to the hiring process
article_text:
Photo: AP

Employer branding should make your company stand out from the competition.

When you're seeking high-quality talent for your company, you can't rely only on the appeal of a specific role to get the results you need.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Robert Carroll
article_metadata.description: During the hiring process, you can use branding to turn your business into a unique entity candidates can easily identify — and a place where they'll want to work. Here are some tips.
